main event: Multiple military personnel observed a silver disc-shaped object over Sandia Base on 24 March 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a softball and was observed moving at speeds up to 700 MPH., Witnesses noted that the object emitted no sound and left no trail., The luminosity of the object was bright aluminum color as the sun reflected off it., Several witnesses confirmed seeing the object until it disappeared from sight., Observations were conducted from various locations including vehicles and buildings near the base.
witness description: Military personnel, including privates and corporals from the 8450th MP Group
